title: Steve Beshear's full rebuttal to Trump's joint address
text: Steve Beshear's full rebuttal to Trump's joint address Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Former Kentucky governor Steve Beshear (D) rebutted President Trump's joint address to Congress on Feb. 28, from a diner in Kentucky. Here are his full remarks following the president's speech.
